trends: There has been one other sighting in Hays
There were no other sightings in Hays on or around January 25th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: kid says round plane with bolts
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my daughter home from school. She says to me look daddy, a round plane with bolts! I really did not look because I was driving. When we got home I began asking her questions. It was over a house and slowly moving south she pointed out to me. What is really more bizzare to me is at age 5 I too saw my first UFO. That was the first time my daughter even mentioned or talked about UFO. Two days later I asked her to draw me a picture of it. I was so amazed by this. I said draw me another. Almost a copy of the first one. I am so surprised because like I said never before did she ever known about UFO. See my girls pictures attached.
